channel.title: Homotopy category on Writing what I'm learning
channel.description: Recent content in Homotopy category on Writing what I'm learning

item.title: The homotopy category
item.description: This is part 9 of a series leading up to and exploring model categories. For the other parts see 1, 2, 3, 4, 5 6, 7 and 8. Last time we ended by giving a definition of a homotopy between maps on the collection of bifibrant objects in a model category. Today we are going to expand further upon this idea, and try to build the theory we are familiar with for topological spaces but in the general setting.
